content: {"name": "Hudson County Department of Family Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/", "email": "", "url": "https://www.hcnj.us/family-services/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "257 Cornelison Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Downtown Jersey City", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7249251, "longitude": -74.06058039999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 420-3000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:15"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:15"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:15"}]}
